meanings.definition: The art or practice of speaking in such a manner that the voice appears to come from a source other than the speaker.
meanings.sent1: During the talent show, the performer amazed the audience with his ventriloquisms, making it seem like his puppet was talking on its own.
meanings.sent2: Ventriloquisms can be entertaining to watch, especially when the ventriloquist makes the puppet seem alive.
meanings.sent3: The ventriloquisms at the circus made the children giggle as they believed the puppet was really talking.
meanings.sent4: Her ventriloquisms were so convincing that it felt like the puppet had a mind of its own.
meanings.sent5: The ventriloquisms were so lifelike that some audience members thought the puppet was real.

meanings.definition: The act of throwing one's voice to make it appear as though it is coming from a different location.
meanings.sent1: The magician's ventriloquisms made it seem like the voice was coming from across the room, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent2: When watching a ventriloquist, pay attention to how they use ventriloquisms to create the illusion of distance.
meanings.sent3: His ventriloquisms were so convincing that people thought the voice was coming from the ceiling!
meanings.sent4: The ventriloquisms were so well done that it felt like the voice was echoing in the room.
meanings.sent5: The ventriloquisms created a mysterious atmosphere, as the voice seemed to float around the audience.

meanings.definition: The skill or technique of manipulating one's voice to create the illusion of a conversation with a dummy or puppet.
meanings.sent1: The ventriloquisms of the performer made it seem like the puppet was really talking back to him.
meanings.sent2: During the play, the actor's ventriloquisms made it appear as though the puppet had a mind of its own.
meanings.sent3: The ventriloquisms of the ventriloquist were so well done that the puppet seemed to have its own voice.
meanings.sent4: Her ventriloquisms were so skillful that it seemed like the puppet was engaged in a real conversation.
meanings.sent5: The ventriloquisms were so realistic that the audience felt like they were witnessing a genuine dialogue between the ventriloquist and the puppet.
